j.packages._object.jpackage¶

  • path: /baselib/jpackages/JPackageObject.py

Data representation of a JPackage, should contain all information contained in the jpackages.cfg

getPathFilesPlatform¶

getPathFilesPlatformForSubDir¶

  • params: subdir
  • path:/baselib/jpackages/JPackageObject.py (line:638)

Return absolute pathnames of the jpackages’s filespath for platform or parent of platform if it does not exist in lowest level if platform not given then will be: j.system.platformtype the subdir will be used to check upon if found in one of the dirs, if never found will raise error all matching results are returned
